mapper.select: UPDATE cart SET total=#{total} WHERE cust_no=#{cust_no}

SELECT ca.cart_no, cu.id AS cust_id, it.item_name AS item_name, it.item_price AS item_price, ca.total, (ca.total * it.item_price) AS total FROM cart ca INNER JOIN customer cu ON ca.cust_no = cu.cust_no INNER JOIN item it ON ca.item_no = it.item_no where ca.cust_no = #{cust_no};
